text: @realDonaldTrump @Facebook Weak, desperation. You are the boy that cried wolf. These fake conspiracies are fabricated by conservative news outlets and Trump to try and serve as a distraction from the pathetic mishandling of COVID-19 at the federal level and the Flynn charge dismissals.
